ukufunda ngomshini: Ama-algorithms avumela amakhompyutha ukuthi afunde kudatha
ukufunda okujulile: Isebenzisa amanethiwekhi e-neural anezendlalelo eziningi ukwenza imisebenzi eyinkimbinkimbi
nlp: Ivumela amakhompyutha ukuthi aqonde futhi acubungule ulimi lwabantu
umbono wekhompyutha: Ivumela amakhompyutha ukuthi 'abone' futhi ahumushe ulwazi olubonakalayo
ukufunda okungajwayelekile: Ukuthola amaphethini kudatha ngaphandle kwamalebula achazwe ngaphambilini
ukumbiwa kwedatha: Ukuthola amaphethini ngaphakathi kwedathasethi enkulu neyinkimbinkimbi
uhlelo lochwepheshe: Ilingisa ikhono lokwenza izinqumo likachwepheshe ongumuntu
sesha i-algorithm: Ihlola indawo yenkinga ngendlela efanele ukuze kutholwe isisombululo
ukumelwa kolwazi: Ulwazi luhlelwa futhi lugcinwe kanjani kumasistimu e-AI
amarobhothi: Inkambu ebhekene nokuklama, ukwakhiwa, nokusetshenziswa kwamarobhothi
agi: I-hypothetical AI enobuhlakani bezinga lomuntu kuyo yonke imisebenzi eminingi
i-algorithm yofuzo: Isu lokucinga eligqugquzelwe izinqubo zokuziphendukela kwemvelo
isihlahla sesinqumo: Imodeli efana nesihlahla yokuhlukanisa idatha ngokusekelwe kuzici
umshini we-vector wokusekela: I-algorithm yokuthola umugqa noma i-hyperplane ehlukanisa kahle idatha
inethiwekhi ye-bayesian: Imodeli ye-Probabilistic emele ubudlelwano phakathi kokuguquguqukayo
isizukulwane solimi lwemvelo: Ukukhiqiza umbhalo ofana nomuntu kusuka kudatha ehlelekile
ukuhlaziywa kwemizwelo: Ukunquma ithoni yemizwa noma inhloso ngemuva kocezu lombhalo
ukuqashelwa kwesithombe: Ukuhlonza izinto noma izici ngaphakathi kwezithombe
ukuqashelwa kobuso: Ubuchwepheshe be-biometric obukhomba abantu ngabanye ngezici zobuso
imoto ezimele: Izimoto ezikwazi ukuzwa indawo yazo futhi zihambe ngaphandle kokufaka komuntu
ukuhumusha ngomshini: Ukuhumusha okuzenzakalelayo kombhalo usuka kolunye ulimi uye kolunye
uhlelo lokuncoma: Ibikezela izintandokazi zomsebenzisi ukuphakamisa izinto noma okuqukethwe
isibonelo esiphikisayo: Okokufaka okuklanyelwe ukukhohlisa imodeli yokufunda yomshini
dlulisela ukufunda: Ukusebenzisa kabusha ulwazi olusuka komunye umsebenzi ukuthuthukisa ukufunda komunye
imodeli yokukhiqiza: Imodeli ye-AI ekwazi ukudala idatha entsha efana nesethi yayo yokuqeqeshwa
i-AI engokomfanekiso: I-AI esekelwe kuzimpawu nemithetho ekhohlisayo (qhathanisa namanethiwekhi we-neural)
uhlelo lwama-agent amaningi: Ukuqoqwa kwama-ejenti e-AI asebenzisana endaweni okwabelwana ngayo
ukuhlelwa kwe-probabilistic: Ukusebenzisa izilimi zokuhlela ukuchaza amamodeli angenzeka
i-neuromorphic computing: Izingxenyekazi zekhompuyutha ezidizayinelwe ukulingisa umsebenzi wama-neurons ebhayoloji
